<h1>#30DayMapChallenge Day 6: Asia</h1>

<p>
Active fires in Asia for the last 24 hours (November 8 and <em>part of</em> November 9)</p>
<p id="nota_subtitle">
<b>Note</b>: Active fires (50% confidence) according to the <b>Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS)</b> satellites, <em>Terra</em>, and <em>Aqua</em>. Some points were located outside of Asia, so it is limited to showing the points that are within the Asian continent.
</p>

```{python}
import altair as alt
alt.renderers.set_embed_options(actions=False)

# = = LOAD DATA = = #
data_polygons_asia = alt.Data(url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/isaacarroyov/30daymapchallenge/main/data/geom_asia.geojson", format = alt.DataFormat(property = "features"))

url_points = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/isaacarroyov/30daymapchallenge/main/data/firms_modis_c6_asia_24h_2023-11-08_09_over50confidence.csv"

# = = DATAVIS CONFIG = = #


# = = LAYERS = = #
geom_asia = alt.Chart(data_polygons_asia).mark_geoshape(color = "#7D9451", strokeWidth=0.1, stroke = "black")

points = (alt.Chart(url_points)
             .encode(
                latitude = "latitude:Q",
                longitude = "longitude:Q")
             .mark_circle(opacity = 0.5, size = 5, color = "red")
          )

# = = FINAL DATAVIS = = #
mapa = ((geom_asia + points)
         .properties(
            width = "container",
            height = 500,
            background = "transparent"
          )
        )

mapa

```


<p id="caption">
<b>Data</b>: <em>Active fire products from the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) for the last 24 h in Asia</em> via NASA's <b>Fire Information for Resource Management System (FIRMS)</b><br><em>Isaac Arroyo (@unisaacarroyov)</em>
</p>
